Experience

Situated in the middle of Busanga Plains, the crown of Kafue National Park, Chisa Busanga is one of Africa’s most unique camps.
The word ‘chisa’ means ‘bird’s nest’ in the local Nyanja language & the rooms were inspired by the weaver bird nests that decorate the trees here.
These unusual & luxurious ‘nests’ were designed by an international architect who wanted to mimic the Busanga Plains’ beautiful surrounds through innovative & environmentally conscious design.
Solar power is used throughout the camp – from the main areas & nests to the game drive vehicles & bicycles used to explore the shallow wetlands beyond.
The area is famous for its frequent lion sightings & endless game viewing opportunities.

Stay

Small & intimate, the camp boasts 4 spacious nests that blend seamlessly into the wild outdoors, while paying attention to modern comforts needed for a comfortable sleeping experience.
What is better than waking up to elephants walking through the mist that rises off the drying floodplains below or falling asleep a little closer to the stars?
Each of the nests has a private deck – the perfect spot to gaze out over the Busanga Plains & a natural waterhole where plenty of animal activity takes place. Romantic travellers will be happy to hear that private lunches & dinners can be arranged on the comfort of their viewing deck.
The communal area also includes a swimming pool where relaxing post-safari afternoons can be spent.

Activities

Chisa Busanga offers a range of exciting activities, including open 4x4 game drives, mountain bike safaris & hot air balloon flights over the scenic Busanga Plains.
Guests can also cool off in the swimming pool & share interesting stories around the campfire under a canopy of stars.

subfolders.title: Busanga Bush Camp
subfolders.description: One of only a handful of lodges in the wild Kafue National Park, Busanga Bush Camp enjoys an island location surrounded by seasonal floodplains & waterways – the Busanga Plains. The camp attracts honeymooners who love Busanga’s private, romantic tents with their open-air bathrooms as well as bird lovers & other nature enthusiasts looking for an off-the-beaten-track safari experience.

subfolders.title: Shumba Camp
subfolders.description: In the northern section of Zambia’s wild Kafue National Park on the legendary Busanga Plains, lies Shumba Bush Camp. Kafue National Park is home to a wealth of game-like red lechwe, puku, zebra & buffalo – a big attraction for predators like leopards, wild dogs, cheetah & prides of lions.

whatWeLoveItems: Ideal setting on the game-packed Busanga Plains
Located in one of Africa’s most untouched safari regions
Game drives, biking safaris & hot air balloon flights
Excellent stargazing opportunities from the campfire
